posts.post_content: Offered here is a very nice T201 of Lake and Wallace just graded by PSA. It has great color and clarity and outstanding eye appeal . It has a small nick in the right border down near the bottom and a corner crease on the bottom right which is hard to see on the front . It is a bit easier to see on the back . The very bottom left has a very small crease in the corner under the shoe of Lake. Offered here for 74.99 plus 4.99 for shipping
